verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3212>Depart,<s%> and <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H2088>hence,<s%> you and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H5927>brought<s%> up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> To your <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> it:

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; and I will <S%H1644>drive<s%> out the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite:<s%>

To a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey:<s%> for I will not <S%H5927>go<s%> up in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you; for you are a stiff <S%H7186>necked<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> I <S%H3615>consume<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> these <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>tidings,<s%> they <S%H56>mourned:<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> did <S%H7896>put<s%> on him his <S%H5716>ornaments.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> You are a stiff <S%H7186>necked<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> I will <S%H5927>come<s%> up into the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you in a <S%H7281>moment,<s%> and <S%H3615>consume<s%> you: therefore <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3381>put<s%> off your <S%H5716>ornaments<s%> from you, that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to you.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5337>stripped<s%> themselves of their <S%H5716>ornaments<s%> by the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> it <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H7368>afar<s%> off from the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H168>Tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%> And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that <S%H3605>every<s%> one which <S%H1245>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up, and <S%H5324>stood<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> at his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door,<s%> and <S%H5027>looked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he was <S%H935>gone<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%> <S%H3381>descended,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> and the Lord <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> at the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6607>door:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up and <S%H7812>worshipped,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face,<s%> as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> to his <S%H7453>friend.<s%> And he <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4264>camp:<s%> but his <S%H8334>servant<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> a <S%H5288>young<s%> man, <S%H4185>departed<s%> not out of the <S%H168>tabernacle.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> you <S%H559>say<s%> to me, <S%H5927>Bring<s%> up <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> and you have not let me <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853>whom<s%> <S%H834><s%> you will <S%H7971>send<s%> with me. Yet you have <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> you by <S%H8034>name,<s%> and you have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H3045>show<s%> me <S%H4994>now<s%> your <S%H1870>way,<s%> that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> you, that I may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight:<s%> and <S%H7200>consider<s%> that this <S%H1471>nation<s%> is your <S%H5971>people.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H6440>presence<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> with you, and I will give you <S%H5117>rest.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H518>If<s%> your <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> not with me, <S%H5927>carry<s%> us not up <S%H2088>hence.<s%>

For <S%H4100>wherein<s%> shall it be <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H645>here<s%> that I and your <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight?<s%> is it not in that you <S%H3212>go<s%> with us? so shall we be <S%H6395>separated,<s%> I and your <S%H5971>people,<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> that you have <S%H1696>spoken:<s%> for you have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and I <S%H3045>know<s%> you by <S%H8034>name.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you, <S%H7200>show<s%> me your <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will make <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2898>goodness<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and I will <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; and will be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to <S%H853>whom<s%> <S%H834><s%> I will be <S%H2603>gracious,<s%> and will show <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H853>whom<s%> <S%H834><s%> I will show <S%H7355>mercy.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> You <S%H3201>can<s%> not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face:<s%> for there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> me, and <S%H2425>live.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> there is a <S%H4725>place<s%> by me, and you shall <S%H5324>stand<s%> on a <S%H6697>rock:<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H5704>while<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> <S%H5674>passes<s%> by, that I will <S%H7760>put<s%> you in a <S%H5366>cleft<s%> of the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and will <S%H5526>cover<s%> you with my <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H5704>while<s%> I <S%H5674>pass<s%> by:
And I will <S%H5493>take<s%> away my <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H268>back<s%> parts: but my <S%H6440>face<s%> shall not be <S%H7200>seen.<s%>
